price: 8. Nabiyow ku Rabbih migaq cusaay, isi qibaadah kaâ fanah aggiriqiyyah iggiriqqiy.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
